name: Chess but all at once!
description:
Early Access:

In Chess but all at once!  players can move all their pieces in one turn. Yup, we're PUSHING THE LIMITS OF CHESS!

Amateurs and Pros alike can enjoy a fresh new take on the game - there's tons of new strategies and shenanigans to discover. 

Enjoy daily challenges, offline play, and player rankings! More coming soon!
